text: 为什么呢！昨天晚上为什么会梦见这个月如果请三天假就有可能连修八天呢！在梦里还计划了去日本的行程。可是这个月根本没有假期 55555

预定本季最佳作品，有第一季《笑吧，皮奥莱维奇！》的神韵。吕严发挥正常，没和土豆搭档之后，他和嘉宾的合作关系就好像从一个大土豆变成很多分散的小土豆了。

编剧很厉害，反讽的底色让那些本来土土的笑点一下子上升一个档次诶，不会突兀让人反感。💢 然而春晚大概率我们还是看不到这样的作品，我们只能看到“小品的世界” 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jR_Auyzv9Gg

( tag: av 是 audio visual 的意思 )

前段时间下雨太频繁，终于跑来给车换了链条。苦了我的小绿....换完链条打完气骑起来好轻盈！

又两个冷知识，之前给一台很老的电脑装机：1. 其 BIOS 只能读 FAT16 格式的启动镜像 2.__ **刻录 FAT16 格式的镜像需要启动盘小于 4GB**__ 3. 手边暂时找不到 <=4 GB 的 U 盘

于是当时一通折腾，给手上的 U 盘分区，写镜像，mount 这，unmount 那，标记 flag，最终成功在老电脑上装了双系统！

另一个，写 Windows 镜像的时候不能直接 dd，这样写的镜像不 bootable
**__> Cloning does not make a bootable USB drive from a current Windows iso file__** 。 在 Linux 系统上可以用 woeusb 这个小工具来写 Win 镜像

ref:
1. https://www.reddit.com/r/techsupport/comments/75sye9/how_can_i_format_a_16gb_sd_card_to_fat_not_fat32/

2. https://askubuntu.com/questions/1174281/why-does-dd-not-make-working-bootable-usb-sticks-for-microsoft

Record an interesting and meaningful thing today.

My friend visited me to watch a series together. The series  produced by Taiwan is a short series about legal defense, involving many elements like criminal justice, the death penalty, and foreign workers. These topics are deep and serious, which makes it hard for me to fully understand.

That's not the main point, though. The point is that we started to talk with our language exchange partner on Zoom after that. We talked about the Paris Olympics opening ceremony again, and I learned a lot about the metro system in Paris. Sometimes our language partner's speech was a bit fast or used some words that we were unfamiliar with. My friend and I put our heads in front of the screen and just said: "Sorry, we're lost T^T"

Yes, we really had an unsmooth conversation, but we tried to figure out the real meaning behind the words through body language, facial expressions, or by typing. I think this is the fun and touching part of language exchange — even though you don't know the language fully, you try to listen and understand each other

相信很多人都不知道的一个冷知识，ordered list formatting 超过 99 之后样式会 broken，需要一些额外的操作来正常展示。
